item.title: Fix error 'index.php was not found on this server' after upgrading ownCloud to version 9
item.author: oliver.gut@flenny.net (Oliver Gut)
item.description:
If you just upgraded ownCloud on Ubuntu 15.10 to version 9 (using apt-get dist-upgrade), you probably get the error message shown above. Adding /index.php manually still redirects to the ownCloud login screen.

As mentioned here open .htaccess in /var/www/owncloud an comment out the line RewriteRule .* index.php [PT,E=PATH_INFO:$1]
